metadata.description: From Dynamite Entertainment comes another spectacular Red Sonja "one-shot" adventure (the first two no longer being available and already Red Sonja classics!)! And this time, we've brought Roy Thomas to the party, hooked him up with Sonja artist Pablo Marcos and Sonja colorist Caesar Rodriguez and they've dropped Sonja smack dab in the middle of "Monster Island!" - filled with deformed men, beasts and creatures of all shapes and sizes! Covers by Marcos and Cliff (Batman, Creeper) Chiang!
metadata.name: Red Sonja Monster Isle
